doc:
Sara Adler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sara_Adler 0 Sara Adler (née Levitskaya, Britannica gives Levitsky; 26 May 1858 – 28 April 1953) was a Russian-born Jewish actress in Yiddish theater who made her career mainly in the United States. She was the third wife of Jacob Adler and the mother of prominent actors Luther and Stella Adler, and lesser-known actors Jay, Julia Adler, Frances, and Florence. The most famous of her 300 or so leading roles was the redeemed prostitute Katusha Maslova in Jacob Gordin's play based on Tolstoy's Resurrection. Sara_Adler ( née_Levitskaya , Britannica gives Levitsky ; 26_May_1858 – 28_April_1953 ) was a_Russian-born_Jewish_actress in Yiddish_theater who made her_career mainly in the_United_States . She was the_third_wife of Jacob_Adler and the_mother of prominent_actors_Luther_and_Stella_Adler , and lesser-known_actors_Jay , Julia_Adler , Frances , and Florence . The_most_famous of her_300_or_so_leading_roles was the_redeemed_prostitute_Katusha_Maslova in Jacob_Gordin 's_play based on Tolstoy 's_Resurrection .
